column4: hey guys during siptoolbox compilation last version i get /usr/local/include/ImageMagick/magick/exception.h:134: error: expected identifier or '(' before 'char'. PLEASE HELP
you might have to switch the default shell from dash to bash. sudo dpkg-reconfigure dash
if I wasn't clear, can you be bothered to ask me a proper question?
i don't understand how that can be related to my issue. i get /usr/local/include/ImageMagick/magick/exception.h:134: error: expected identifier or '(' before 'char'.
I see, you're probably right. I thought it was a shell error.
